issues: Naming inconsistency: Phase 1/2 use '-review-' but Phase 3 sometimes uses '-sportsbook-review-' causing tracking confusion
Token limit exceeded on Ireland Wonder Luck Phase 3 (first attempt) - required retry with condensed instructions
UK 22bet Phase 3 was skipped in the pipeline - discovered during quality audit
Ahrefs MCP returned 403 errors intermittently - Python fallback script worked reliably
improvements: Standardize file naming convention across all phases (use consistent base name)
Add automatic token estimation before Phase 3 generation to select haiku model proactively
Implement pipeline completion verification after each wave to catch missing files immediately
Add post-generation quality gate that runs markdownlint and checks for complete file sets
Consider parallel agent health monitoring to detect stalled or failed tasks earlier
